name: Alter-Ego
description:
Multi-language.

Fresh new game design.

This is a game for Comunity Gamejam 2019.

This is the project of two crazy guys who don't know how many hours you need to create a multi-language setup for a jam!

Alexander Hernandez is the code master of this project.

Jorge Pérez is the key piece of creativity and crazy desings.

Maybe you have some try to this project.
